episodes.synopsis: Discover the power of shoulder-fired missiles and other awesome weaponry at the United States Marines School of Infantry.
episodes.title: Marines

episodes.synopsis: Watch soldiers of the 1st Armored Division prepare for war as they face tough simulated combat and live-fire training at the National Training Center.
episodes.title: Army NTC

episodes.synopsis: Follow U.S. Army Reserve forces as they clear rooms and repel insurgent attacks with small arms, grenades and precision teamwork.
episodes.title: Citizen Soldiers

video.title: Live Fire
video.synopsis: Join a group of Marine recruits and go through their uncompromising training program as they are transformed into formidable warriors.
